channel.title: Copy of Digg top 24 hours
channel.description: RSS feed with direct links to popular technology articles. based on superdigg pipe

item.title: [+3430] Google...Now Serving Cowardliness (PIC)
item.description: Tried this myself. Yup, it's true.

item.title: [+2554] Bacon or Beer Can?
[+2277] Little PC Girl vs. Little Mac Girl
[+2037] Is this the man? (Comic)
[+1914] YouTube Suspends Kid's Account, Gets Porn Fest In Protest
item.description: Thanks to the members of the online community 4chan, YouTube woke up this morning to newly uploaded videos that intersperse innocuous footage with images that are most decidedly NSFW. But 4chan's declaration of YouTube Porn Day isn't a mere prank. It's much more personal than that -- it's revenge. And it's all because of a kid called Lukeywes1234.

item.title: [+1843] US Soldier Holds American Flag Protest Sign [Pic]
[+1581] My girlfriend is a lot like me [Pic]
[+1251] 5 Reasons Pigs Are More Awesome Than You - The Oatmeal
item.description: A comic explaining why pigs are the reigning champs of the animal kingdom, and you're kind of a giant ball of suck.

item.title: [+1226] Tiger Woods Sex Tape Title Suggestion by Digg Community
item.description: Digg community is suggesting great titles for Tiger Woods sex tape.

item.title: [+1196] Crashing The Penguin Party
[+1148] Thank You Fortune Cookie! [PIC]
item.description: Now I know what it means.

item.title: [+946] Gingerbread House...OF THE DAMNED!! (PICS)
item.description: Each year my work does a gingerbread house building contest between the departments. It took a little convincing but I got my team to build a Zombie themed house. Some of the girls were a little turned off at first, but once they saw how awesome this was looking, they started to contribute.

item.title: [+781] Colbert Salutes Domino's For Admitting Their Pizza Is Gross
item.description: Domino's old pizza wasn't fit to wipe your ass with, but there are so many things Stephen would wipe with the new stuff.

item.title: [+759] The Most Useless Machine Ever (VIDEO)
[+727] The Daily Show Searches for Beck/O'Reilly's 'Good Old Days'
item.description: Beck and O'Reilly like to (literally) cry about the 'Good Old Days' all the time. Well, John Oliver would like to know exactly when the hell that was.

item.title: [+705] Mr. Brain says "you asked for it!" (PIC)
item.description: I suppose if you're going to have them in a rich country sauce, you might want them to pile it on.

item.title: [+689] Obama Reneges on Health Care Transparency - CBS Evening News
item.description: During the campaign candidate Obama regularly promised something different - to broadcast all such negotiations on C-SPAN, putting the entire process of pounding out health care reform out in the open. (That promise applied to the now-completed processing of forging House and Senate bills, too.)

item.title: [+688] 38 Snowmen Nightmares: Calvin and Hobbes In Real Life
item.description: Here are some of the best snowmen nightmares, where fans of the Calvin and Hobbes comic strip created real life, unhappily ever after tributes of the snowmen series.

item.title: [+657] Passive-Aggressive WiFi Notes (PICS)
item.description: You folks with wireless networks still named “linksys” or “trendnet” are clearly missing out on a priceless opportunity to piss off your neighbors.

item.title: [+577] Natalie Portman: 'I don't want to end up on a porn site'
item.description: Natalie Portman says she avoids sex scenes in her Hollywood career because she does not want to end up "as a screen grab on a porn site".
